member.name: E:Acura.TSX_2004.Volume_Change
member.summary: This event will change the volume to the value passed as a parameter. It has a checksum for the last (14th) byte of the data block. The checksum is calculated as the volume level plus the 0 value for volume level (A9).

member.name: E:Acura.TSX_2004.Touch_Event
member.summary: Dynamic event received when a user touches somewhere on the navigation screen.

member.name: F:Acura.TSX_2004.CarDevice.Touchscreen
member.summary: The touchscreen controller in the navigation screen.

member.name: F:Acura.TSX_2004.CarDevice.Navigation
member.summary: The navigation unit in the trunk.

member.name: F:Acura.TSX_2004.CarDevice.Head_Unit
member.summary: The dashboard unit including the screen and all of the dashboard buttons.

member.name: M:Acura.TSX_2004.Send_Volume_Change(System.Int32)
member.summary: Emulates This event will change the volume to the value passed as a parameter. It has a checksum for the last (14th) byte of the data block. The checksum is calculated as the volume level plus the 0 value for volume level (A9).

member.name: M:Acura.TSX_2004.Send_Touch_Event(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Emulates Dynamic event received when a user touches somewhere on the navigation screen.
